Reviews.Title: TFT Monitor - Best quality for the price!
Reviews.Author: RRamkissoon
Reviews.Content: Very good quality display for the price charged......used with a factory reverse camera and saw good quality display....would purchase another for my other vehicle or recommend to purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
5" digital color TFT LCD monitor
2 ways to install it
High-resolution picture
the monitor will start up automatically
ProductInfo.Name: 5inch TFT LCD Car Rearview Monitor Sunshade Stand & Sucker Bracket 2 Video Input
